display.name: Safari Bingo!
display.description: Every Safari BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, and unleashes zoo animals into new rooms.

display.name: Challenging Bingo!
display.description: Every Challenging BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, and adds 5 stacks of Bingo Challenge, and adds 20% more chance for champions.

display.name: Boinging Bingo!
display.description: Every Boinging BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, gets you jumping, and causes some bouncy explosions.

display.name: Retro Bingo!
display.description: Every Retro BINGO adds 20% item rarity and quantity, 50% Soul Chance, and spawns mobs like the good old days...

display.name: Surprise Bingo!
display.description: Every Surprise BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, and adds surprises when you open chests...

display.name: Enchanted Bingo!
display.description: Every Enchanted BINGO causes a random Enchanted Elixir event to happen every 45 seconds.

display.name: Cursed Bingo!
display.description: Every Cursed BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, 25% soul chance, and adds a stack of Cursed! to the vault.

display.name: Spooky Bingo!
display.description: Every Spooky BINGO adds 100% Soul Chance plus a 25% chance for a mob to spawn a ghost on death and 3 stacks of Haunting.

display.name: Infernal Bingo!
display.description: Every Infernal BINGO adds item quantity and item rarity, plus a 2.5% chance for a mob to gain Infernal Modifiers.

display.name: Sweet Bingo!
display.description: Every Sweet BINGO adds 20 Cake Layers to the vault, and adds wildly spawning candy mobs.

display.name: Fungal Bingo!
display.description: Every Fungal BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes the vault fungal, and gives mobs a chance to poison!

display.name: Electrifying Bingo
display.description: Every Electrifying BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes the vault stormy, and makes mobs faster.

display.name: Freezing Bingo!
display.description: Every Freezing BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and makes the vault snowy!

display.name: Burning Bingo!
display.description: Every Burning BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and lights the vault on fire, making mobs angry and hit harder!

display.name: Mini Bingo!
display.description: Every Mini BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes mobs shrink, and gives them -40% health, and more speed!

display.name: Big Bingo!
display.description: Every Big BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes mobs grow, and gives them 80% more health.

display.name: Bonus Bingo!
display.description: Every Bonus BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 30%, and boosts soul chance by 75%

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul chance by 25%

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every subsequent BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul chance by 25%, and boosts your crate tier by 1!

display.description: Mobs gain +50% Damage, +50% Health and +20% Movement Speed

display.description: Doubles all loot and triples its rarity!

display.description: Reveals all doors inside the vault!

display.description: Increases mob damage, mob health and mob spawns by 10% per stack, increases mob speed by 1.5% per stack
